title: A Return Visit To The Snow Geese Of Vermont
teaser: It's a Here & Now Thanksgiving tradition to revisit Robin Young's trip with her now-late uncle to see the migrating snow geese.
contentencoded:
We join Here & Now’s Robin Young and her now-late uncle, Lachlan Maclachlan Field, on their trip to see the migrating snow geese in Vermont. Robinâ€™s pilgrimage has become a Thanksgiving tradition at Here & Now.
